result.description: Describe in detail both the process and the generated trained datasets. Report all technical specifications and stored datasets stored on all Data Cubes. This report provides the ontologies and mappings to be used for realizing the DeepCube Semantic Cube. The deliverable provides the data cubes with ARD per se, to allow further exploitation.
